alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 7:10PM EST until January 10 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Delaware... Red Clay Creek At Wooddale affecting New Castle County. For the Red Clay Creek...including Wooddale...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Clay Creek at Wooddale. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, Flooding begins in adjacent open fields. At 7.5 feet, Barley Mill Road begins to flood. Brandywine Springs Park floods. At 8.5 feet, Flooding begins near Old Capital Trail and Newport Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 5.4 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 8.9 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.0 feet on 01/19/1996. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (7 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Stg Time Date Red Clay Creek Wooddale 7.0 5.4 Tue 6 pm 3.3 MSG 8.9 10pm 1/09 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 715 AM EST.
